overall.description: Create a new 1-dimensional array from an iterable object.

iterable.description: An iterable object providing data for the array.

dtype.description: The data-type of the returned array.

count.description: The number of items to read from iterable.  The default is -1, which means all data is read.

note: Specify count to improve performance.  It allows fromiter to pre-allocate the output array, instead of resizing it on demand. '
